what: Elegant S7-based parallel job orchestration for R
title: ToDo
text: {warprrr} provides clean, modern interface running background parallel jobs using S7 classes, mirai daemon(s), callr process management. Perfect computationally intensive workflows need robust error handling progress monitoring.

title: ToDo
text: S7 Class System: Type-safe, modern R object system Parallel Processing: Efficient daemon-based parallelization via mirai Background Execution: Non-blocking job execution callr::r_bg Error Resilience: Built-tryCatch error handling per job Progress Monitoring: Console spinner live status updates Flexible Configuration: Customizable daemon count cleanup options Clean API: Intuitive print(), summary(), run_jobs(wait_for_results) methods

title: ToDo
text: can install development version warprrr CRAN :

what: Multiple Functions in Parallel and in Background
title: ToDo
text: can run multiple different functions, arguments, parallel background jobs using {warprrr}. Just supply list functions matching list argument sets:

title: ToDo
text: Optimal Daemon Count: Start ceiling(cores / 5), adjust based workload Batch Size: Group small tasks reduce overhead Memory Usage: Monitor bg_args = list(supervise = TRUE) Error Recovery: Use tryCatch functions custom error handling

title: ToDo
text: S7: Modern object system mirai: High-performance parallelization callr: Background R processes purrr: Functional programming toolkit cli: Progress indicators glue: String interpolation

title: ToDo
text: full documentation, visit package website API reference: Reference manual Report issues: GitHub Issues

title: ToDo
text: Windows: Make sure Rtools installed compilation. Linux/macOS: Ensure system build tools (gcc, make, pandoc) present. Parallel/job failures: Check job@results error output; validate function arguments. Session Info: Please include output sessionInfo() bug reports.
